columns.County_Id: The unique identifier for each county.
columns.Population: The total number of residents in the county.
columns.Zip_code: The postal code assigned to the county.

county.table_description: The table provides information about counties within the election database.

columns.Party_ID: The unique identifier for each political party.
columns.Year: The election year associated with the party.
columns.Party: The name of the political party.
columns.Governor: The name of the party's governor candidate.
columns.Lieutenant_Governor: The name of the party's lieutenant governor candidate.
columns.Comptroller: The name of the party's comptroller candidate.
columns.Attorney_General: The name of the party's attorney general candidate.
columns.US_Senate: The name of the party's US Senate candidate.

party.table_description: The table provides election party candidate information for various elections.

columns.Election_ID: The unique identifier for each election.
columns.Counties_Represented: The counties included in this election.
columns.District: The district associated with the election.
columns.Delegate: The name of the delegate representing the election.
columns.Party: The political party associated with the election.
columns.First_Elected: The year when the delegate was first elected.
columns.Committee: The committee the delegate is part of.

election.table_description: The table provides information about election details and associated delegates.
